simplifiedChinese.title: What to do in Times of Trouble
simplifiedChinese.Question1: List all the many questions raised in this passage. Who makes them? To whom are they made?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: Is there a question that impacts you more than others? Why?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: What questions would do you have about issues raised in this passage?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: What can you do to get some answers to these questions you have raised?
